title: Analyze post WWII decline of nationalism

content.question:
Directions: The suggested writing time for this question is 35 minutes. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer.

Many historians have suggested that since 1945, nationalism has been on the decline in Europe. Using both political and economic examples from the period 1945 to 2000, evaluate the validity of this interpretation.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
